comfy-beds.command.normal: Use a bed to set your respawn point
comfy-beds.command.command: Run this command while resting to set your respawn point
comfy-beds.command.shiftClick: Use a bed while sneaking to set your respawn point
comfy-beds.command.notShiftClick: Use a bed while sneaking to rest without setting your respawn point
comfy-beds.command.clickHere: Click %s to set your respawn point
comfy-beds.command.no_bed: You cannot use a bed to set your spawn here
comfy-beds.mehrad-config.description.all: If enabled, you are allowed to rest during the day. However, the day will not be skipped if it's before nighttime.
comfy-beds.mehrad-config.description.cha:
Normal: Same as vanilla, when you right-click a bed.

/setbed: When you use the /setbed command while you are resting in a bed.

Shift Click: When you shift-clicking a bed.

Normal Click: When you right-click the bed without shifting.
comfy-beds.mehrad-config.description.pro: If enabled, you will be provided with some instructions about setting your respawn point when you rest in a bed.
comfy-beds.mehrad-config.description.out:
Explode: Same as vanilla, beds will explode.

Monsters: You may not rest now; there are monsters nearby.

Rest: You will be allowed to rest in the nether, without setting your respawn point.
